    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion et réfraction de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Reflection and refraction of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Brechung des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e refraction da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione e rifrazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση και διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión y refracción de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'une certaine partie de la lumière est  réfléchie et qu'une autre partie est réfractée quand la lumière  voyage du verre à l'air.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that some light is reflected and some is refracted when light travels from glass to air.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bornes</string>
            <string language="en">boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">verre</string>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fibres optiques</string>
            <string language="en">optical fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß etwas Licht 
reflektiert wird und einiges refracted, wenn Licht von Glas zu Luft 
reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que alguma luz está 
refletida e algum refracted quando a luz viaja do vidro ao ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che una certa luce è 
riflessa ed alcuno refracted quando la luce viaggia da vetro ad aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι κάποιο φως 
απεικονίζεται και μερικά διαθλιούνται όταν ελαφριά ταξίδια από 
το γυαλί στον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que una cierta luz está 
reflejada y algo está refractada cuando la luz viaja del cristal al 
aire.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
